Articles.Content:
I haven't seen any thread about base's yet, and bases are some of the things i love most in KSP, so i'll make one.

Post your mun, duna, eelo and all other kind of bases here

Here is my entry, the KVOPB-129 a portable base driven by solar power

It can get a maximum speed of around 15m/s and can hold 13 kerbals, and have 4 Commotron 88-88, 6 solar arrays, 2 SP-L 1x6 Photovoltaic Panels, 3 Electric engines, 4 Big wheels and over 150 OX-STAT Photovoltaic Panels

Here is a picture i took at it before startup :

I'm planning to take it to the north pole, anyways post your base(s) below i'll love to see it.
Actually, this is the first goolge hit. Which reminds me, I was about to post something there.
